activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason M Yonker

2:59 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker not in court. Calling 22CF82, 22CF63, 22CF128, 22CM15, 22CM48, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. Court review of case. Defendant states has contacted PD's office - statement to charges/bond. Pfeifer objects to any bond modification. Court will take under advisement - bond continued. adj. 03:05 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

1:54 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary M. Sowinski in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker appeared by video, in custody. Calling 22CF128, 22CF63, 22CF82, 22CM15, 22CM48, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. 22CF128 set for an initial appearance. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - PD's office not able to appoint counsel yet in prior cases. Sowinski statement to bail - statement to prior charges. Defendant statement to Vilas/Oneida County charges. Court sets bond. adj. 02:03 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:55 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker in court. Calling 22CF63, 22CF82, 22CM15, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. Court quashes warrant. Defendant states cab was running late and called JA. Court questions Defendant on address. Defendant states he does not have documentation on interview - will not give him anything. Court swears Defendant in. Defendant states he did not have an interview. Court directs Defendant not to obtain any new cases/be on time for all court appearances/do not lie. Bond continued. 03:01 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:49 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker not in court. Calling 22CF63, 22CF82, 22CM15, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. Court review of case. Schiek requests warrant be authorized. Court authorizes warrant. adj. 02:51 PM

1:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jason M Yonker appeared by video, in custody.
